snippet: Lonnie G. Thompson, one of the scientists who essentially discovered global warming, has for years climbed mountains to gather ice he examines for climatic changes.
abstract: Climate scientist Lonnie G Thompson, who achieved worldwide recognition for his analysis of ice cores, is one of the most prominent of the generation of scientists, who in the latter decades of the 20th century, essentially discovered the problem of global warming; after neglecting his own health in pursuit of his science, Thompson has received a heart transplant and says he is on a mission to find the world's oldest ice (Series: Temperature Rising).
lead_paragraph: Lonnie G. Thompson, one of the scientists who essentially discovered global warming, has for years climbed mountains to gather ice he examines for climatic changes.
